August, 1902. 


CONTRIBUTION TO THE NATURAL HISTORY OF THE 
 PEARLY NAUTILUS. 

By ARTHUR WILLEY, D.Sc. Lond., Hon. MA. Cantab. 
 Director of the Colombo Museum, Ceylon.

With 18 Text-figures.
